metadata.title: CVE-2018-13302 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In FFmpeg 4.0.1, improper handling of frame types (other thanEAC3_FRAME_TYPE_INDEPENDENT) that have multiple independent substreams inthe handle_eac3 function in libavformat/movenc.c may trigger anout-of-array access while converting a crafted AVI file to MPEG4, leadingto a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
